TunableList.name: ModifierSliders
TunableList.description: List of modifier pairs used for pregnancy. Each modifier pair should consist of two opposite-pole modifiers that together make up a slider. For example: 'yfHeadBelly_Small' and 'yfHeadBelly_Big'

Tunable.name: MaxSliderValue
Tunable.description: Value that this slider will be set to when the Sim is 100% pregnant.

Tunable.name: ModifierName0
Tunable.description: Name of modifier corresponding with the 0% pregnant side of the slider. This must be prefixed with the name of the .modifiers.xml where this modifier is defined. For example: 'yfHeadBelly_Small'.

Tunable.name: ModifierName1
Tunable.description: Name of modifier corresponding with the 100% pregnant side of the slider. This must be prefixed with the name of the .modifiers.xml where this modifier is defined. For example: 'yfHeadBelly_Big'.

TunableEnum.name: OccultType
TunableEnum.description: Valid occult type for these modifiers
